alert.note: Alert for Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yellowstone County through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lockwood, or 9 miles northeast of Billings, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shepherd, Huntley, Worden, Ballantine and Lockwood. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
